name: Moe Era
description:
So, what is Moe Era about?
Why, it's about cute things and having fun!
And, of course, a deep, intriguing story!
A story that makes you think...
Now, some technical facts:
Non-linear gameplay with 8 possible endings5 main characters and a small but charming supporting cast40+ CGs, 25+ BGs, 40+ music tracks
Meet Sima, Nana, Marta and Teya.
Become a hero of Moe Era! We count on you!
